_comments: `filter_save_enable` is the key of enable or disable filter usb data save to txt,
`yes` is enable, `no` disable will save all data
`filter_save_rules` is active when `filter_save_enable` set to `true`, disable set to `false`
`data_offset` is first filter value position of the usb data, start from 0, 2 number is 1 byte, offset is byte,, ignore space
`value` is the data hex value, need split with space
`is_equal` is set filter value equal or not equal usb data in `data_offset` position
`max_file_size` how many data can write to one file, 1024 is 1M, 1 is 1K, min is 1K
`rotation_file_interval` is time interval save one file, 10 is 10 minute, min is 1 minute
